thread.title: Grammy Awards 2017: Beyonce Performs Lemonade While Pregnant With Twins (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Grammy Awards 2017: Beyonce Performs Lemonade While Pregnant With Twins (VIDEO)

author: Jessica Bennett
title: Grammy Awards 2017: Beyonce Performs Lemonade While Pregnant With Twins (VIDEO)
text:
February 12, 2017 by Jessica Bennett 0 Shares Advertisement 
Beyonce â€™s recent pregnancy announcement had many of her fans worried her Grammy night performance may suffer. 
The Queen showed up however, true to form and amazed her fellow peers even with two babies in her belly. 

Mama Tina Knowles introduced the most nominated artist of the night, congratulating both Bey and sis Solange on their Grammy wins for the night. 
Hubby Jay Z and daughter Blue Ivy cheered on the diva from the audience as well. 
Bey did take it easier than usual this time around, trading in her signature, high-energy dance moves for a more laidback approach accommodating her changing physique. 
Her beautiful reditions of "Love Drought" amd "Sandcastles" left much of the audience speechless. 
Credit: Getty 
The 35-year-old announced her pregnancy via Instagram, letting fans know that daughter Blue Ivy could expect not one but two more siblings!
